oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Worry Hour - 1940-03-11 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's The Worry Hour, 1940-03-11, part 1. Personnel include David Cobb (announcer), 'Professor Phineas Fret' (host), Francis Craig (musical director) and his Orchestra, Snooky Lanson (vocalist, introduced as Snooky Landman), Jane Grant (vocalist), and Kitty Kallen (guest, vocalist) featured vocalist of Jack Teagarden's Orchestra. Held at WSM's Studio C. Sponsored by the National Life & Accident Insurance Company.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Francis Craig; Francis Craig and his Orchestra; Snooky Lanson; Jane Grant
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Opening statement (Phineas Fret) -- In The Mood (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Phineas Fret and David Cobb talk -- All The Things You Are (Snooky Lanson vocals, Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Phineas Fret and David Cobb talk -- David Cobb introduces Kitty Kallen -- Blue Skies (Kitty Kallen vocals, Francis Craig and his Orchestra) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Worry hour (Radio program); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Cobb, David (Announcer); Phineas Fret; Craig, Francis, 1900-1966; Lanson, Snooky; Grant, Jane (Singer); Kallen, Kitty; Teagarden, Jack, 1905-1964; Jack Teagarden Orchestra
